original_text: He wanted to make their kingdom weak. He did not want it to become strong enough to fight against him. He wanted them to obey his agreement with him.
korean_text: 이는 나라를 낮추어 스스로 서지 못하고 그 언약을 지켜야 능히 서게 하려 하였음이거늘

sentences.original_text: He wanted to make their kingdom weak
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 왕국을 약하게 만들고 싶어했다

sentences.original_text: He did not want it to become strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것이 강해지는 것을 원하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: He wanted them to obey his agreement
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 그의 약속을 지키기를 원했다
